ygData.subject: [ANN] Heritrix 1.12.0
ygData.msgSnippet: This note is to announce the release of Heritrix 1.12.0.  It is available for download at sourceforge:

Subject: [ANN] Heritrix 1.12.0
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281; y=NwXu5HVZsMR9QXJPdXMDFOi6RDIiVW9w6DEyNQRcioQKGRkniTfE6ZSl
X-Yahoo-Profile: stackarchiveorg

This note is to announce the release of Heritrix 1.12.0.  It is 
available for download at sourceforge: 
http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=73833.

Release 1.12.0 is the first of several planned releases enhancing 
Heritrix with "smart crawler" functionality. In this release, the theme 
has been offering new options to reduce the amount of duplicate content 
crawled and stored when recrawling sites at regular intervals. A number 
of other enhancements and bug fixes are also included.   Please see the 
Release Notes for details: 
.http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes/1_12_0.html

Yours,
The Internet Archive Webteam
